notesStmt.note: Slight loss to finial and a few worm holes. A few erasures, usage stains and ink smears. Dirt on verso. Two tiny edge tears. Ink dark brown, with burn-through in parts, slight abrasion at outer end.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
